article_metadata.description: Courting Extremism is a weekly feature on conservative responses to the Supreme Court vacancy.  Despite the fact that an overwhelming majority of voters want the Senate to hold hearings on Judge Merrick Garland’s nomination to the Supreme Court, Senate Republicans continue to refuse to even let Garland answer questions.
